title: Kandy Esala Perahera comes to an end: Perahera Sannasa to the President
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva – The traditional ceremony to inform the head of the state on the successful completion of the historic Esala Festival took place at the President’s House in Kandy in the presence of President Mahinda Rajapaksa this afternoon on 21 August. The Perahera Sannasa (Scroll of Memorandum)…
